snippet: Glyn B. Davies, the senior American envoy on the North, said he had discussed “all aspects of the North Korea issue,” including sanctions, during a visit to Beijing.
abstract: Glyn B Davies, senior American envoy on North Korea, says he has discussed 'all aspects of North Korea issue' with Chinese officials, including sanctions against North, during visit to Beijing.
lead_paragraph: Glyn B. Davies, the senior American envoy on the North, said he had discussed “all aspects of the North Korea issue,” including sanctions, during a visit to Beijing.

headline.seo: U.S. Envoy Talks With Chinese About North Korea
headline.main: U.S. Envoy Talks With Chinese About North Korea
headline.print_headline: China: U.S. Envoy Calls Efforts On North Korea ‘Work in Progress’
